core_patterns.name: Factory Method
core_patterns.description: Creates objects without specifying the exact class

core_patterns.name: Observer
core_patterns.description: Notify multiple objects of state changes

variant_patterns.name: Adapter
variant_patterns.description: Allow incompatible interfaces to work together
requirements: Implement Adapter pattern using online shopping system examples
Create abstract base class with proper interface
Add UML class diagram in docs/uml/

variant_patterns.name: Template Method
variant_patterns.description: Define the skeleton of an algorithm
requirements: Implement Template Method pattern using online shopping system examples
Create abstract base class with proper interface
Add UML class diagram in docs/uml/
